articles.title: Iran FM accuses UN Security Council of ‘indifference’ over Israel attacks
articles.description: TEHRAN: Iran’s Foreign Minister Abbas Araghchi slammed the United Nations Security Council on Sunday, accusing it of “indifference” over Israel’s deadly attacks on the Islamic republic.

articles.title: Helicopter carrying Hindu pilgrims crashes in India, killing seven people
articles.description: The accident happened within minutes of the helicopter taking off, on what should have been a 10-minute flight to a Hindu pilgrimage site in the Himalayas.
articles.content:
A helicopter carrying Hindu pilgrims has crashed in India, killing seven people on board.
The accident happened within minutes of the helicopter taking off, officials said, on what should have been a 10-minute flight.

articles.title: PH seeks global support for UN Security Council bid at Independence Day event in NY
